title: How does nationalism look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nationalists loves their own countries just a little too much. There are times when nationalism is healthy. Being proud of where you come from is no crime. But nationalism is like a prescription drug: just the right amount can be helpful but too much of it is toxic for your body and soul. It is fine to love your country, but blindly following it, accept you leaders’ words without question, blaming social ills on singled-out minority groups, and xenophobia are all symptoms of toxic nationalism.
